titles.title: Feral Swine Eradication and Control Pilot Program Act of 2011

To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide financial assistance to the State of Louisiana for a pilot program to develop measures to eradicate or control feral swine and to assess and restore wetlands damaged by feral swine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs
